Text: The Sport Relief special, also referred to as "Beckham in Peckham" was an edition of the BBC sit-com, "Only Fools and Horses", recorded as part of the "Sport Relief 2014" appeal.

Text: Sport Relief 2014 Special: Beckham was also the person that got in touch with Jim Sullivan, the son of the late "Only Fools and Horses" creator John Sullivan about doing something for "Sport Relief 2014".
